mapper.select: select code as value, omschrijving as label from art46.DOSSIER_OVERDRACHT_STATUS order by volg_nr

select dt.OMSCHRIJVING, doc.DMS_EDIT_URL from smeg.dossier sd inner join smeg.BUNDEL_BUNDEL bb on sd.id = bb.PARENT_BUNDEL_ID inner join smeg.DOCUMENT doc on bb.CHILD_BUNDEL_ID = doc.ID inner join SMEG_REF.DOCUMENTTYPE dt on doc.TYPE_ID = dt.ID WHERE dt.code in ('CODE2003') and sd.DOSSIER_ID = #{dossier_id_boa}
mapper.insert: insert into art46.DOSSIER_OVERDRACHT (versie_nr, dossier_type, dossier_id, status_start_d, status, deleted_jn) select distinct 1, 'B', ados.id, current date, 'registrati', 'N' from smeg.dossier sd inner join smeg.BUNDEL_BUNDEL bb on sd.id = bb.PARENT_BUNDEL_ID inner join smeg.DOCUMENT doc on bb.CHILD_BUNDEL_ID = doc.ID inner join SMEG_REF.DOCUMENTTYPE dt on doc.TYPE_ID = dt.ID inner join art46.dossier ados on sd.dossier_id = ados.dossier_id_boa left join smeg_ref.DOCUMENTSTATUS docs on doc.STATUS_ID = docs.ID left join art46.DOSSIER_OVERDRACHT doso on ados.id = doso.DOSSIER_ID WHERE 1 = 1 and dt.code in ('CODE2003') -- Overdrachtsfiche dossier BB naar IVS handhaving and doc.STATUS_ID = 38 -- nota bij bestemmeling and doso.OVERDRACHT_ID is null -- bestaat nog niet als overdracht.
